Primitives and required spans

HyphaMind v1.1 defines required span attributes for each primitive. If a span lacks the required fields, REFRAIN pauses and VALVE refuses additional reach.

Primitive invariants (v1.1)
PrimitivePurposeArtifactsRequired Span Fields
ROOTSeed run with provenance anchor and grants.root.digest, grants.network[]root.digest, purpose.of.use
VALVEPolicy enforcement and refusal codes.valve_decision, policy.decisionvalve_decision, policy.decision, consent.scope
CLASPBind consent envelopes to spans.consent_envelope_idconsent_envelope_id, consent.terms.version
TRACEPropagate verifiable span metadata.trace_span_id, trace.parent_idtrace_span_id, root.digest, consent_envelope_id
MIREEmit events when entropy breaks tolerances.mire_event, entropy.measureentropy.measure, risk.level, trace_span_id
SCARAttach compliance marker and refusal clarity.scar.marker, refusal.codescar.marker, policy.decision, operator.note
COMPOSTPersist immutable receipts and audit history.compost.bundlecompost.bundle, retention.clock
SPOREExport vetted bundles to downstream consumers.spore.hash, export.pathspore.hash, root.digest, consent.receipt.hash
REFRAINPause flows when consent drift exceeds tolerance.refrain.trigger, ece.scoreece.score, mire_event.id

If any primitive misses its required fields, REFRAIN raises a pause, VALVE responds with a refusal code, and SPORE is prevented from exporting the bundle.
